an4.202:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco assaddho hoti, ahiriko hoti, anottappī hoti, appassuto hoti, kusīto hoti, muṭṭhassati hoti, duppañño hoti.
an4.202:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco attanā ca assaddho hoti, parañca assaddhiye samādapeti;
an4.202:6.3: attanā ca ahiriko hoti, parañca ahirikatāya samādapeti;
an4.202:6.4: attanā ca anottappī hoti, parañca anottappe samādapeti;
an4.202:6.5: attanā ca appassuto hoti, parañca appassute samādapeti;
an4.202:6.6: attanā ca kusīto hoti, parañca kosajje samādapeti;
an4.202:6.7: attanā ca muṭṭhassati hoti, parañca muṭṭhassacce samādapeti;
an4.202:6.8: attanā ca duppañño hoti, parañca duppaññatāya samādapeti.
an4.202:7.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco saddho hoti, hirimā hoti, ottappī hoti, bahussuto hoti, āraddhavīriyo hoti, satimā hoti, paññavā hoti.
an4.202:8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco attanā ca saddhāsampanno hoti, parañca saddhāsampadāya samādapeti;
an4.202:8.3: attanā ca hirimā hoti, parañca hirimatāya samādapeti;
an4.202:8.4: attanā ca ottappī hoti, parañca ottappe samādapeti;
an4.202:8.5: attanā ca bahussuto hoti, parañca bāhusacce samādapeti;
an4.202:8.6: attanā ca āraddhavīriyo hoti, parañca vīriyārambhe samādapeti;
an4.202:8.7: attanā ca upaṭṭhitassati hoti, parañca satiupaṭṭhāne samādapeti;
an4.202:8.8: attanā ca paññāsampanno hoti, parañca paññāsampadāya samādapeti.
